consMethods.description: Consumed methods - the subset of the methods available on this API that the consumer has declared that they use.

consTenant.description: Consuming tenant: the tenant with the app installed that is consuming the API

consAppDev.description: Consuming app developer: the developer who owns the app consuming the API

consApp.description: Consuming app: the app consuming the API

apiDev.description: API developer: the developer who owns/defines the API being consumed

apiUriTemplate.description: API URI Template: the URI template (as per https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6570) of the API being consumed

consAsSoT.description: Consuming as Source of Truth: true if the app is consuming this as a source of truth API, otherwise false

prodTenant.description: Producing tenant: the tenant with the app installed that is producing the API

prodAppDev.description: Producing app developer: the developer who owns the app producing the API

prodApp.description: Producing app: the app producing the API

location.description: a URI template as per RFC 6570 which has had the template parameter replaced with the actual value for the producing tenant, and that should be used to prefix the API URI to make the call
